videos.description: Brandon Johns Jr. gets the hot hand early, knocking down 3-pointers in consecutive possessions to give Michigan the lead over Rutgers.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Johns buries back-to-back triples for Michigan) 2020/02/01

videos.headline: Johns buries back-to-back triples for Michigan

videos.description: With one second to play in the first half, Michigan's Austin Davis misses a free throw, but Brandon Johns Jr. is there to tip it in before the buzzer sounds.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Johns tips it in at the buzzer) 2020/02/01

videos.headline: Johns tips it in at the buzzer

videos.description: Michigan whips the ball around the perimeter, with every player touching the ball before Brandon Johns Jr. knocks down a corner 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Great ball movement sets up Michigan 3) 2020/02/01

videos.headline: Great ball movement sets up Michigan 3

videos.description: Jacob Young picks off a pass on defense and takes it the other way, finishing in transition with a two-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Young steals and slams for Rutgers) 2020/02/01

videos.headline: Young steals and slams for Rutgers
